title: Zendaya and Hunter Schafer enjoy epic Euphoria Rue and Jules reunion
text:
What an epic Rue and Jules reunion (Picture: Rex)

Euphoria stars Zendaya and Hunter Schafer looked over the moon to see each other as they reunited at ELLE’s 26th Annual Women In Hollywood Celebration.

The pair played friends and lovers Rue and Jules in the hit HBO show and as they arrived at the annual celebration, the pair couldn’t keep the smiles off their faces.

Zendaya was an honouree at the event – along with Mindy Kaling, Nicole Kidman, and Dolly Parton

Hunter introduced the 23-year-old Spider-Man star to the stage and later she took to Instagram to share red carpet snaps of her pal, writing: ‘Hunty appreciation post.’

They were joined by fellow co-star Syndey Sweeney, who played Cassie Howard in the show.

The pair played friends and lovers Rue and Jules (Picture: Rex)

Hunter introduced the 23-year-old Spider-Man star to the stage (Picture: Rex)

Hunter Schafer, Sydney Sweeney and Zendaya were all at the party (Picture: Rex)

Zendaya showed off her fashion chops at the party, wearing what essentially appeared to be her entire wardrobe; her outfit included a blazer, a button-up shirt, a skirt, trousers, bright white heels, and a belt.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Fash-un.

Zendaya showed off her fashion chops (Picture: EPA)

Sydney Sweeny, Zendaya, Hunter Schafer and Storm Reid (Picture: Rex)

Season one of Euphoria ended with Rue asking Jules to leave town before Rue herself backed out, leaving Jules on her own.

Season two will begin filming in early 2020 although Zendaya admitted thhat alrthough she has no idea yet where we will find the two, she hopes that they are ‘healthy’ and able to ‘find each other again’.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

‘Euphoria was eight months of my life, and now that it’s done I’m like, “Fuck”. You put your shit out there, and it’s a really terrifying thing to do. It’s out for the world to see—it’s so fucking weird,’ she told ELLE.

‘I don’t feel too dissimilar from Rue. It didn’t feel fake to me; it felt like she was me in another version of my life.’

description: Zendaya starred as Rue in teen drama Euphoria.
